name: Renooster
description: A web application that allows users to keep track of your subscriptions.

name: Nav Grub
description: An Easy Way to Search and Find Favorite Restaurants Near You

name: Day Planner
description: Simple daily calendar application that allows you to save events for each hour of a single day. Utilizes responsive web design to scale to wach type of device screen

description: Simple Weather App that uses the OpenWeather API to retrieve weather data for cities

name: Burger App
description: Applicaiotn that allows you to track a list of birgers that you desire to eat and if you have eaten them.

name: Employee Summary
description: Node CLI that takes in information about employees and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.
